topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55561a4c6368725f340c1900#post_55561a4c6368725f340c1900
I never claimed to be logical; actually I've claimed numerous times on this thread to actually be illogical.  I'm just the sort of person who gets long winded and that cause if I were to speak with brevity I would be completely unintelligible.

The reason why I talk the way I do is because I can't orchestrate my thoughts enough to put them in a understandable manner elsewhere.  That's why I get long winded some times is because what I'm trying to convey I don't know how to summarize or such.

If I were to talk about say robotics or such in short succinct manner I legitimately would not be able to put it in a understandable manner.


Tl:dr; thanks for shitting on someone directly for them having problems speaking.

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55561d7e6368723c123e0500#post_55561d7e6368723c123e0500
[bq="Thanotos Omega"]"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55561c5f63687233274d4400#post_55561c5f63687233274d4400
i'm not saying this to be mean, but you come off like that guy claiming there is no way this new species can breach the container after it's already cracked the glass,[/bq]
The reason why I talk the way I do is because I know only about 7k words (that's english as a second language low amount of vocabulary).  It's legitimately really shitty of you to make fun of someone that tries to make the most out of their limited vocabulary for the way they talk.

Tl:dr; you're being a dick

If intelligence was dependent on vocabulary amount then shouldn't book writers be running the Large Hadron Collider?
